Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Boston in 1967...
Injured on 7/27/1967 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/6/1968 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/2/1972, off Jerry Koosman (TEX)...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Minnesota on 5/12/1972...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/15/1972, hitting .484 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1972, hitting .378 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1972, hitting .325 with 11 HR, 81 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/15/1976 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1977...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against California on 4/12/1978...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1978, hitting .538 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
